catList: The purpose of this course is to help students develop an understanding of the dynamics of innovation, and to focus on succesful strategies to manage the challenges posed by these dynamics. We will review the unique characteristics of industries characterized by frequent innovation, and explore how strategies in these industries are (or are not) different from other contexts. We will also focus on the process of managing innovation, both internally and externally. This course is suited for students aspiring to become entrepreneurs, general managers or consultants to general manager who are faced with situations in which innovation in new products, services and technologies is important, or those who would like to build basic backround on the topic of strategy and innovation.
